Title: Yammyy - a Yammer Client for .NET
Description: Yammyy is a Yammer Client for .NET framework (Yammer is like twitter for companies  http://www.yammer.com/). Yammyy is rich yammer client based WPF, and supported OAuth. If you search WPF or OAuth for .NET samples,  yammyy project  may help you to make your implementation.
HomeWiki:
Yammyy

Yammyy is a Yammer Client for .NET framework (Yammer is like twitter for companies. http://www.yammer.com/).


Implementation

Yammyy is a rich yammer client based WPF, and supported OAuth. If you search WPF or OAuth for .NET samples, yammyy project may help you to make your implementation.

Future works

Now Yammyy is under construction. so after complete implementation, i will enhance some functions like belows.
  • Location Aware
  • Social Graph
  • etc...
